name: Rusty Blade (Rising Phoenix Games)
description:
Rusty Blade is a text based game about the final quest of a veteran level cruncher.

Special Thanks to Daniel Ponce, for letting us build a game off his awesome cartridge design.

Game Pad

For that genuine Famicom feel, use a retro game pad!
Use the [A] and [B] keys to play.

Keyboard
Use the [A] and [B] keys to play.
Use [Esc] to exit the game.
Alternatively, use the "period" and "forward slash" keys for [A] and [B] respectively.

Mouse
Use Left Click for [A].
Use Right Click for [B].

Unlocks
Finish the game to unlock Free Play Mode.
